span.style: text-align: right; font-style: italic; display: block;

content.p: I have HP-UX 11.31, the last version, installed on the system. I haven't done much with it yet, but more will come in the future. I didn't get any drive caddies with it, so I designed some to 3D print. I made them look similar to the original caddies, as well as blank ones."
